entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
